Fantastic「4」business package entails exciting offers for travellers Published on : Tuesday, September 1, 2015
Cosmopolitan Hotel Hong Kong, Cosmo Hotel and Dorsett Mongkok, Hong Kong are pleased to invite business travellers to experience a comfortable and hassle-free stay at their premises with the new Fantastic 「4」Business package.
Fantastic Connection
· FREE use of smart phone with unlimited 3G internet, Wi-Fi hotspot for multi-device connectivity, local and IDD calls to Australia, Canada, China, Japan, Korea, Malaysia, Singapore, UK and US (this mobile phone can be used both inside and outside of the hotel)
· Premium in-room Wi-Fi
Fantastic In-room Amenities
· Water Bar featuring 4 types of premium bottled water including Fiji natural artesian water (Sanbenedetto Mineral Water at Dorsett Mongkok)
Fantastic Breakfast Buffet
· Scrumptious daily breakfast buffet featuring a variety of international fares and a variety of made-to-order egg dishes*
Fantastic Airport Lounge Access at Hong Kong International Airport**
· If book 3 nights consecutively, free 3-hour of relaxing moment at Plaza Premium Lounge with unlimited serving of food & beverage, shower facility, free Wi-Fi and more upon departure
More value-added services: Free Shuttle Bus Service and 24-hour Full Stay***
Besides the fantastic 「4 」benefits, the hotels also provide other value-added service to alleviate one’s stay experience. This includes free shuttle bus service to 15 shopping and business destinations such as Causeway Bay Plaza 2 in Causeway Bay, Hong Kong Convention & Exhibition Centre in Wan Chai, Pacific Place in Admiralty, IFC Mall in Central, Airport Express Line Hong Kong Station for guests staying at Cosmopolitan Hotel and Cosmo Hotel Hong Kong. Guests at Dorsett Mongkok will also get to enjoy free shuttle bus service to multiple destinations such as Element, Sky 100, Langham Place, Canton Road, Hong Kong China Ferry Terminal and more.
Understand that when it comes to business trips, every second counts. In order to ensure business travllers get the most out of their traveling endeavors, the hotels have introduced 24-hour Full Stay programme, which allows one to check in any time of the day and enjoy 24-hour stay. With this pioneering service, regardless of what time guests arrive, the hotels promise a room is always ready for them.
HK$950 at the newly renovated Premier Room at Cosmopolitan Hotel Hong Kong
Both Cosmopolitan Hotel and Cosmo Hotel are located in the bustling commercial districts between Wan Chai and Causeway Bay, Hong Kong. With only HK$950 per room per night, guests can enjoy a luxurious stay at the Cosmopolitan Hotel’s newly renovate Premier Room with all the mentioned fantastic benefits. Cosmo Hotel Hong Kong, which is only two blocks away from its big sister Cosmopolitan Hotel, offers a more affordable option, with only HK$850 per room per night, guest can choose to stay at its colour-coded Executive Suite that features chic yellow, green or orange.
Located in between Tai Kok Tsui and Mongkok, Dorsett Mongkok, Hong Kong is a popular choice for business travellers who wish to discover the other side of Hong Kong and soak up the local cultures when they are not in a meeting or in front of their desktops. This area offers a plethora of food options from local cha chan teng (coffee shop) to Michelin-starred restaurants at a fraction of the cost elsewhere. Popular markets like Temple Street, Ladies Market and Jade Market are also in close proximity.
Now, from as low as HK$800 per room per night, guests can experience a comfortable stay at the stylishly designed Executive Room and relish the charming neighbourhood for a different kind of business stay.
